#define GETNUM ( n,
val   ) 
Value:
for (; p < end && rb_enc_isdigit(*p, enc); p++) {       \
        int next_n = 10 * (n) + (*p - '0'); \
        if (next_n / 10 != (n)) {\
            rb_raise(rb_eArgError, #val " too big"); \
        } \
        (n) = next_n; \
    } \
    if (p >= end) { \
        rb_raise(rb_eArgError, "malformed format string - %%*[0-9]"); \
    }
